channel.title: Macros on Coding life
channel.description: Recent content in Macros on Coding life

item.title: How to develop Swift Macros
item.description: This tutorial is a step-by-step guide to develop Swift Macros. We will develop an attached Macro called Singleton , which helps reduce the tedious code of writing a singleton struct or type.

item.title: Macros in Swift vs. KSP in Kotlin
item.description:
Preface

In essence, these two technologies are completely different. While one is generating code by expanding the macro patterns, another is generating code freely based on the meta data stored in the complied code.

item.title: My Experience in Developing Swift Macros
item.description: I have developed a collection of Swift Macros in this repo recently. This article will summarise my experience and hopefully it would be helpful for your tasks.
